timeline.bodyText: Please remove this. There is no such method defined in interface Node
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyText: Same here. No such method defined in interface Node
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyText: Why startProcessWithCorrelationKeyFromNodeIds method name? why not startProcessFromNodeIds method name for consistency and coherency across classes?
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyText: Not really useful as it will print out memory address only - no toString method is implemented in NodeInstanceList class

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add assertions making sure that the process is running and the nodes supplied above are active?
timeline.author: sutaakar

timeline.bodyText: Please move the fail statement after process instance abortion, this way the process instance is not aborted when an exception is thrown.
timeline.author: sutaakar
sutaakar

timeline.bodyText: May be better to rename the test method to something like testStartProcessFromNodeId to distinguish it from usual process start.
timeline.author: sutaakar

timeline.message:
[JBPM-9129] Start process without triggering a start node

adding rest api to provide access to start process from arbitary nodes.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                                          @ApiParam(value = "entry type from the history", required = false,
          
          
            
                                                                    example = "123") @QueryParam(PROCESS_INST_HISTORY_TYPE) String processInstHistoryType,
          
          
            
                       @ApiParam(value = "entry type from the history", required = false, example = "START") @QueryParam(PROCESS_INST_HISTORY_TYPE) String processInstHistoryType,
